resources.string: And stay connected with them ever after

WhatsApp Business is an Android app which is free to download, and was built with the small business owner in mind. With the app, \nbusinesses can interact with customers easily by using tools to automate, sort, and quickly respond to messages\n

resources.string: To add a new Customer, click the button on Right bottom corner
In Name Field - Add the Name of your Customer/Organisation
In Phone Field - Add the contact number of the Customer \n (The number should be available in WhatsApp to send regular Messages)
In Email Field - Add the EMAIL ID of the customer

In Amount Due Field - The Amount Customer hasn't paid so far... for the services On clicking on a customer option in the List...it takes you to their Details
 Here you can edit the customer details 
 You can send messages by clicking the Send Message Button.
 The prerecorded message will be send to the customer via WhatApp Business
